subtitle: The nutty flavours in this soup complement the mushrooms very well.

method.text: Melt the butter in a large heavy-based saucepan. Add the mushrooms, shallots and garlic and cook, stirring, for 4 min.
Stir in the hazelnuts and cook for 1 min. Gradually mix in the milk and stock. Add the nutmeg and seasoning. Bring to the boil then lower heat, cover and simmer for 20 min.
Puree half the soup in a blender until smooth and return to the pan. Just before serving, stir in the cream, reserving a tablespoon of cream per serving, and heat gently.
Adjust the seasoning and serve garnished with swirls of reserved cream.

title: Cream of mushroom and hazelnut soup
